title: Simple 2D Game with Pygame
description: A basic space shooter game created with Python and Pygame library

details.objective: Create a fun, playable 2D space shooter game with basic mechanics and scoring system
details.approach: Used Pygame library to handle game loop, sprite rendering, and collision detection
details.outcomes: Completed a fully playable game with multiple enemy types, power-ups, and increasing difficulty
details.learnings: Learned fundamentals of game development including sprite animation, collision handling, and game state management

title: File Organizer Script
description: Python utility to automatically organize files based on type, date, or custom rules

details.objective: Create a useful script to automatically sort and organize files in cluttered directories
details.approach: Built with Python's os and shutil modules with configurable sorting rules via a simple YAML config
details.outcomes: Developed a tool that successfully organizes files by type, date, or custom patterns with backup functionality
details.learnings: Improved skills in file system operations, command-line argument parsing, and creating user-friendly utilities

title: Website Login Tester
description: Selenium-based tool to automate testing login functionality across multiple websites

details.objective: Build a reusable tool for testing login forms on websites to identify issues quickly
details.approach: Created with Python and Selenium WebDriver using a simple configuration file for test credentials
details.outcomes: Developed a tool that can test multiple sites and output detailed success/failure reports with screenshots
details.learnings: Learned how to effectively automate web form interactions and handle various login implementations

title: 2D Platformer with Phaser
description: A simple platformer game created with JavaScript and the Phaser framework

details.objective: Create a browser-based platform game with responsive controls and basic level design
details.approach: Built with Phaser 3 game framework, utilizing its physics engine and asset management
details.outcomes: Completed a playable game with multiple levels, collectibles, enemies, and a scoring system
details.learnings: Gained experience with browser-based game development, sprite animations, and game physics
